availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Stephen Willliams (Breathitt County, Kentucky, farmer and justice of the peace)

body.p: Breathitt County, Kentucky, farmer and justice of the peace. Kentucky native. Married to Sarah "Sally" Black Williams. Father of Livina Williams, Gilbert H. Williams, Greenville Williams, Cynthia A. Williams, Samantha Williams, Logan Williams, Arminia Williams, Emoline Williams, Crystan Williams, and Stearlin Williams. Farmer in Breathitt County in 1860. Justice of the peace in Breathitt County in 1864.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Breathitt County, District 1, p. 92; Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Breathitt County, Precinct No. 1, p. 16-17; Find A Grave, "Stephen Williams (1822-1896)," Memorial #32595410, http://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=32595410&ref=acom (accessed March 23, 2017); KYR-0001-007-0308.
